welcome.description: I have over 2.5 years of experience as a Junior Java Developer, creating and expanding software. I graduated from the Kielce University of Technology with a Master of Science in Computer Science.

about.title: About
about.p1: Hello! Iâ€™m Jakub, a programmer from Poland, specifically from Kielce. I mainly specialize in backend development, but I also enjoy working on frontend from time to time. 😉
about.p2: I am currently working at Altar sp. z o.o. on the SARA project, which is an IT platform supporting multimedia service operators and content providers.
about.p3: Outside of work, I love watching TV series and creating my own programming projects that present new challenges for me. 😄

description.li1: Creating and developing the backend written in Java (SpringBoot) and in Kotlin
description.li2: Creating the frontend layer in Angular
description.li4: Developing the SARA system - an IT platform supporting multimedia service operators and content providers

description.p: The goal of the internship was to create a web application that allowed users to store files in the cloud. The application was created in Java (SpringBoot) and Angular.

description.p1: A project for a hotel management system based on microservice architecture.
description.p2: The application features 2FA (two-factor authentication) login security.
description.p3: The frontend of the application was developed using the Angular framework. It utilizes UI libraries such as ngPrime, Bootstrap, and Angular Material.
description.p4: The backend was developed using the Spring Boot framework (Java). It supports JWT tokens and uses the Spring Data library for database communication.
description.p5: The application includes translations into Polish, English, and Ukrainian.

description.p1: A project for a web application to manage company expenses.
description.p2: Users can enter their own expense categories and generate monthly expense and income reports.
description.p3: The application includes translations into Polish and English.
